notes: Crystals form the facets, moss softens the equator, nebula gas wraps the sky while abstract wall drives emissive veins.
Keep iron dominant for a reflective core, freeze the poles with ice, infuse a red stellar gas halo, and accent fissures with lava emissive.
Warm planks carry the base color, blue star gas supplies the aurora glow, and glass overlay feathers the shimmer.
